data.name: Gravelock Elder
data.description: Other Gravelock creatures you control gain +1 Attack and +1 Health while Gravelock Elder is in play.
data.flavor: Gravelocks look up to their elders... literally.

passiverules.name: Ranged attack
passiverules.description: This unit does not take damage from attacking Spiky units.

data.name: Gravelock Raider
data.flavor: You can handle one or two, but before you know it, they're everywhere.

passiverules.name: Relentless
passiverules.description: If opponent blocking unit is destroyed, this creature will continue its attack.

data.name: Infected Gravelock
data.description: When Infected Gravelock attacks a creature, that creature gets poisoned for 3 rounds. Infected Gravelock has Move 0.
data.flavor: "It's seeping out of their god-damn pores."\n- Lord Ungstram, Royal Strategist

data.name: Gravehawk
data.description: For each of your Gravelocks, Gravehawk gains +1 Attack.
data.flavor: "Mom always said I'd end up in bad company. If she only knew..." \n- Ryssa, Gravehawk

passiverules.name: Relentless
passiverules.description: If opponent blocking unit is destroyed, this creature will continue it's attack

data.name: Elan Vital
data.description: Enchanted unit is healed by 1 Health each round.
data.flavor: Heal faster than you hurt and you'll keep fighting forever.

data.name: Crown of Strength
data.description: Enchanted unit gains +1 Attack and +2 Health.
data.flavor: The power of kings, imbued through discarded headwear.

data.name: Bear Paw
data.description: Enchanted unit gains +2 Attack and +2 Health. When Bear Paw enters play, enchanted unit's Countdown increases by 1.
data.flavor: The gods saw fit to give it strong limbs and a mellow temperament.

data.name: Binding Root
data.description: Enchanted unit's Move is decreased by 1.
data.flavor: There's no better ally than the ground beneath your enemies.

data.name: Hymn
data.description: Heal target unit by 3 Health.
data.flavor: Music for those who can't dance.

data.name: Metempsychosis
data.description: Target unit you control is resummoned on the same tile.
data.flavor: Consider the egg. The image of unfulfilled potential, and you eat them for breakfast...

data.name: Thought Trap
data.description: Target unit's Countdown is doubled.
data.flavor: How far will a blind dog walk into a forest?

data.name: Rallying
data.description: All units you control have their Countdown decreased by 2.
data.flavor: FOLLOW THE JARL FOR THE KIN!

data.name: Brother of the Wolf
data.description: When Countdown is 0, Brother of the Wolf can summon one Ragged Wolf instead of attacking.
data.flavor: Befriending wolves isn't that hard. Failure, however, can be costly.

abilities.name: Summon Wolf
abilities.description: Summon a Ragged Wolf. Countdown increases by 2.

data.name: Callback
data.description: Target unit you control is returned to your hand.
data.flavor: Everyone deserves a second chance.

data.name: Catapult of Goo
data.description: Units attacked by Catapult of Goo have their Countdown increased by 1.
data.flavor: "I don't know if the piddlejacks are drivers or parasites on that infernal machine." \n- Ihrbraman, Creature Collector

passiverules.name: Lobber
passiverules.description: This unit attacks at a specific section of the board.

data.name: Thunder Surge
data.description: Target unit, and all units connected by adjacent units, receive 2 damage.
data.flavor: Fear not the thunder. Fear the lightning.

data.name: Champion Ring
data.description: Enchanted unit gets +2 Attack.
data.flavor: Hard to earn, even harder to carry.

data.name: Burn
data.description: Deal 3 damage to target unit. If that unit is destroyed, draw 1 scroll.
data.flavor: "If you can't handle the fire, cool yourself in the kettle." \n- Old machine priest saying.

data.name: Fertile Soil
data.description: Sacrifice target creature you control and draw 3 scrolls.
data.flavor: The Kinfolk don't mourn their dead; nature doesn't waste life.

data.name: Death Cap Berserk
data.description: When Death Cap Berserk comes into play, and at the beginning of its following turns, enchanted creature's Countdown is decreased by 2. At the end of these turns, it is dealt 2 damage.
data.flavor: "I love music. Especially wardrums." \n- Harald, Berserker

data.name: Destroyer
data.flavor: About to dodge? It's too late!

passiverules.name: Lobber
passiverules.description: This unit attacks at a specific section of the board.

data.name: Druid Burial Ground
data.description: At the beginning of your turn, Druid Burial Ground heals 1 Health of all adjacent units.
data.flavor: "I once saw two cats fighting next to such a monument. The fight lasted a week, then they starved to death."\n- Ihrbraman, Creature Collector

data.name: Quake
data.description: Deal 3 damage to all structures and 2 damage to all creatures.
data.flavor: No matter your skill, you can't parry the ground.

data.name: Inferno Blast
data.description: Deal 1 damage to target tile and all adjacent tiles.
data.flavor: The power of ten men in one practical projectile.

data.name: Flip
data.description: Move target opponent unit to any unoccupied tile on opponent's board.
data.flavor: A shift in perspective isn't always a good thing.

data.name: Frost Wind
data.description: Add +1 Countdown to units on target tile and all adjacent tiles.
data.flavor: Packing an extra blanket is always good. Or five, if you're heading north.

data.name: Great Wolf
data.description: Great Wolf gets +1 Attack for every other Wolf you control.
data.flavor: The beasts have legends too.

passiverules.name: Relentless
passiverules.description: If opponent blocking unit is destroyed, this creature will continue it's attack

data.name: Iron Ogre
data.flavor: Step aside or be disintegrated.

passiverules.name: Armor 1
passiverules.description: All combat damage dealt to Iron Ogre is reduced by 1.

passiverules.name: Relentless
passiverules.description: If opponent blocking unit is destroyed, this creature will continue its attack.

data.name: Junkyard
data.description: Rat creatures you control gain +1 Health while Junkyard is in play.
data.flavor: Rats aren't picky.

data.name: Kinfolk Brave
data.flavor: Braves are eager to prove their worth. The Jarls are happy to let them.

data.name: Kinfolk Jarl
data.description: For each creature adjacent to Kinfolk Jarl, Kinfolk Jarl gains +1 Attack.
data.flavor: The strength of his people, crushing your people.

passiverules.name: Relentless
passiverules.description: If opponent blocking unit is destroyed, this creature will continue its attack.

data.name: Leeching Ring
data.description: When enchanted creature deals damage, enchanted creature is healed by as much Health as its original Countdown.
data.flavor: Search the ponds. Find one and your name is eternal.

data.name: Mangy Wolf
data.description: When Mangy Wolf deals damage, it is healed by 1. Other Wolf creatures you control have their Countdown decreased by 1 when Mangy Wolf comes into play.
data.flavor: "The fat wolf is not dangerous."\n- Kinfolk proverb

data.name: Dryadic Power
data.description: Enchanted creature gains +1 Attack and +3 Health, and its Move is decreased by 1.
data.flavor: The strength of a tree with the resolve of a rock.

data.name: Potion of Resistance
data.description: All damage dealt to enchanted unit is reduced to 1 for 3 rounds.
data.flavor: Sometimes you've just got to take the hit.

data.name: Pushback
data.description: Target opponent unit is returned to its owner's hand.
data.flavor: You know you're not wanted when your body dissolves.

data.name: Ragged Wolf
data.flavor: Fast and feisty.

passiverules.name: Haste
passiverules.description: Creature comes in play with Countdown set to 0.

data.name: Kabonk
data.description: Deal 1 damage to target unit. Draw 1 scroll.
data.flavor: Ouch!

data.name: Shrine
data.description: While Shrine is in play, all other units you control gain +1 Health.
data.flavor: With a strong enough faith, you don't need gods for miracles.

data.name: Sinmarked Zealot
data.description: When Countdown is 0, Sinmarked Zealot can be sacrificed to deal 2 damage to target unit.
data.flavor: When his time comes, so will yours.

abilities.name: Sacrifice Attack
abilities.description: Deal 2 damage to selected enemy and kills itself.

data.name: Sister of the Fox
data.description: When Sister of the Fox comes into play, draw 1 scroll.
data.flavor: The eyes and ears of the Jarl.

data.name: Royal Vanguard
data.description: When Royal Vanguard's Countdown becomes 0, adjacent units gain +2 Attack until end of turn.
data.flavor: Honor. Power. Axe.

data.name: Speed
data.description: Target unit's Countdown is decreased by 3.
data.flavor: They won't know what hit them.

data.name: Essence Feast
data.description: For each unit you control, heal your idol on the same row by 1. Beast creatures deal double damage to idols this turn.
data.flavor: Just like love, it can heal and hurt.

data.name: Pother
data.description: Target unit is moved to a random adjacent tile. Draw 1 scroll.
data.flavor: Now you're there, now you're not!

data.name: Unleash Inner Power
data.description: Target creature's Attack is increased by its Health value. Its Health is then set to 2.
data.flavor: My very essence shall be my blade.

data.name: Lifestealer
data.description: When Lifestealer attacks and destroys a unit, Lifestealer is fully healed.
data.flavor: One day he'll pay for these borrowed lives.

data.name: Eternal Statue
data.description: At the beginning of your turn, Eternal Statue heals 1 point of Health.
data.flavor: It's said some sculptors infuse their work with a life of its own.

data.name: Waking Stones
data.description: All damage dealt to Waking Stones is reduced to 1.
data.flavor: "The problem with stone is that it is stationary. We fixed that."\n- Uria, Geo Mage

data.name: Transposition
data.description: Switch places of two units you control. Draw 1 scroll.
data.flavor: You don't need powerful allies. You need allies in the right places.

data.name: Vitality Well
data.description: When Vitality Well's Countdown becomes 0, all friendly units are healed by 1.
data.flavor: Refreshing!

passiverules.name: Haste
passiverules.description: Creature comes in play with Countdown set to 0.

data.name: Blessing of Haste
data.description: Target unit's Countdown is decreased by 1.
data.flavor: A little bit of speed can make all the difference.

data.name: Ancestral Totem
data.description: While Ancestral Totem is in play, creatures you control gain +1 Attack.
data.flavor: Kinfolk creations aren't always pleasant.

data.name: Copper Automaton
data.description: Copper Automaton is destroyed after attacking.
data.flavor: Explosively cute.

data.name: Spark
data.description: Deal 2 points of damage to target unit.
data.flavor: The smallest spark can cause a decent flame.

data.name: Cannon Automaton
data.flavor: wrrr wrrr clunk phssssht BwoooOOOM wrrr wrrr

passiverules.name: Armor 1
passiverules.description: All combat damage dealt to Cannon Automaton is reduced by 1.

passiverules.name: Ranged attack
passiverules.description: This unit does not take damage from attacking Spiky units.

data.name: Bitter Root
data.description: When Bitter Root is attacked in melee, attacking unit becomes poisoned for 3 rounds.
data.flavor: "Sure, there's plenty to eat in the swamps. Shame it's all poisoned." \n- Gundar, Marsh Guide

data.name: Violent Dispersal
data.description: Destroy target unit.
data.flavor: "When he said 'Disperse!' I thought he meant all of us. Turns out he was only addressing poor Mikal." \n- Mahts, Infantryman

data.name: Focus
data.description: Target unit gains +3 Attack until end of turn.
data.flavor: If it's worth killing, kill it good!

data.name: New Orders
data.description: All your units have their Move increased by 1 until end of turn.
data.flavor: REGROUP!

data.name: Honorable General
data.description: When Honorable General's Countdown becomes 0, all adjacent units have their Countdown decreased by 2.
data.flavor: Time and again, he has brought victory. The Empire's reward is war.

data.name: Kinfolk Veteran
data.flavor: It's tough getting old in this business.

passiverules.name: Haste
passiverules.description: Creature comes in play with Countdown set to 0.

data.name: Rumble
data.description: Opponent's units move one step to a random adjacent empty tile.
data.flavor: Shaken, not crushed.

data.name: Fury
data.description: All units decrease their Countdown by 1.
data.flavor: Fanning the flames of battle.

data.name: Crimson Bull
data.description: All units you control gain +2 Attack until end of turn.
data.flavor: Drink, and take flight!

data.name: Machine Priest
data.description: Instead of attacking, Machine Priest heals all your structures by 1. When Countdown is 0, Machine Priest can move a structure one step in a random direction instead of healing.

abilities.name: Displace Structure
abilities.description: Target structure is moved to a random unoccupied, adjacent tile.

data.name: Ember Bonds
data.description: Enchanted unit receives 2 damage before attacking.
data.flavor: It's inevitable.

data.name: End of Reason
data.description: Sacrifice all units you control with a non-zero Countdown. Each unit sacrificed this way deals 2 damage to opponent units on the same row.
data.flavor: "You served me well as soldiers. Now serve me as projectiles!"\n- Arran, Machine Priest

data.name: Ether Pump
data.description: When Ether Pump attacks, all opponent's units are dealt 1 damage.
data.flavor: "I know what it looks like! Trust me. A few of these will win any siege." \n- Arran, Machine Priest

data.name: Golem Skin
data.description: When Golem Skin comes into play, sacrifice all your structures. Enchanted creature gains Attack and Health equal to the number of structures sacrificed.
data.flavor: When you wear machines, laundry day is your greatest worry.

data.name: Frost Gale
data.description: Deal 1 damage to all units.
data.flavor: Bad weather is a great weapon. If only you could aim it.

data.name: Magma Pack
data.description: When Magma Pack comes into play, enchanted unit's Attack is doubled. Enchanted unit is destroyed after attacking.
data.flavor: Don't worry, just push the button when you arrive.

data.name: Plate Armor
data.description: Enchanted unit has Armor 1 (combat damage dealt to enchanted unit is decreased by 1) and its Health is increased by 1.
data.flavor: "If only we had enough for everyone..."\n- Lord Ungstram, Royal Strategist

data.name: Tick Bomb
data.description: Destroy target structure.
data.flavor: Sounds like tick, looks like tick.

data.name: Vitriol Aura
data.description: When enchanted unit is attacked in melee combat, attacker becomes poisoned for 3 rounds.
data.flavor: Try not to breathe.

data.name: Eye of Eagle
data.description: Take the next creature scroll from your library and add it to your hand.
data.flavor: Strategy is nothing if you're blind.

data.name: Proximity Charge
data.description: When Proximity Charge is destroyed in melee combat, attacking unit is dealt 4 damage. When Proximity Charge comes into play, one copy is summoned on a random adjacent tile.
data.flavor: Tread lightly!

data.name: Frostbeard
data.description: When Frostbeard is killed in battle, all friendly units gain +2 Attack until end of your turn.
data.flavor: An honorable death is not to be mourned; it's a blessing.

data.name: Heritage
data.description: When enchanted unit you control is destroyed, you draw 2 scrolls.
data.flavor: "This way your life, or death, won't be a complete waste." \n- Lord Ungstram, Royal Strategist

data.name: Faith Blessing
data.description: Target unit you control takes 2 damage. Your idol on that row is healed by 4.
data.flavor: "It's an immense honor. Be grateful for it." \n- Pater Brecht

data.name: Nutrition
data.description: Sacrifice target unit you control and add that unit's cost to your current resources.
data.flavor: A cadaver for some, a feast for others.

data.name: Powerbound
data.description: When enchanted unit you control is destroyed, increase your Order by one.
data.flavor: "I'll just borrow some life force when you don't need it anymore."\n- Lord Ungstram, Royal Strategist

data.name: Gun Automaton
data.flavor: A special kind of turtle.

passiverules.name: Ranged attack
passiverules.description: This unit does not take damage from attacking Spiky units.

data.name: Vengeance Veil
data.description: When enchanted unit takes damage, its Countdown decreases by 1.
data.flavor: All is blood from behind the crimson veil.

data.name: Useless Contraption
data.flavor: Working as intended.

data.name: Purification
data.description: Remove all Enchantments from target unit.
data.flavor: The innocence of youth can cleanse the corrupt.

data.name: Ranger's Bane
data.description: Enchanted creature becomes poisoned for 3 rounds.
data.flavor: You haven't really died until you've been slowly strangled by poisonous roots.

data.name: Horn of Ages
data.description: All units opponent controls have their Move decreased by 1 until end of opponent's turn.
data.flavor: You're thankful for surviving battles past, until you crumble under the weight of the memories.

data.name: Mire Curse
data.description: Mire Curse deals 1 poison damage to adjacent creatures at the beginning of each of its turns.
data.flavor: It's putrid, but it's home.

data.name: Faith Chains
data.description: When enchanted creature is destroyed, Faith Chains deals 1 damage to each of opponent's idols.
data.flavor: "The chains weigh heavier on them, my son." \n- Pater Brecht

data.name: Bloodboil
data.description: When enchanted unit takes damage, increase the unit's Attack by 2.
data.flavor: AURRGH... YOU... I... KILL RAAAHH!!

data.name: Summons
data.description: Draws one Structure from your library.
data.flavor: "We need more stuff!" \n- Lord Ungstram, Royal Strategist

data.name: Scattergunner
data.flavor: "He was carrying WHAT?!"\n- Mahts, Infantryman

passiverules.name: Ranged attack
passiverules.description: This unit does not take damage from attacking Spiky units.

data.name: Law Memorial
data.description: When Law Memorial comes into play, increase Order by 1.
data.flavor: You'd think a people so fond of writing would remember the words of their ancestors.

data.name: Desert Memorial
data.description: When Desert Memorial comes into play, increase Energy by 1.
data.flavor: Breakers against the eroding waves of time.

data.name: Tribal Memorial
data.description: When Tribal Memorial comes into play, increase Growth by 1.
data.flavor: Lest we forget the times of peace.

data.name: Woodland Memorial
data.description: When Woodland Memorial comes into play, increase Growth by 1.
data.flavor: The Kinfolk have forgotten, but the trees remember.

data.name: Sand Pact Memorial
data.description: When Sand Pact Memorial comes into play, increase Energy by 1.
data.flavor: Like grains of sand in an hourglass, our memories fade over time.

data.name: Stone Pact Memorial
data.description: When Stone Pact Memorial comes into play, increase Order by 1.
data.flavor: We remember the times, but not the promises.

data.name: Illthorn Seed
data.description: When enchanted unit you control is destroyed, summon Illthorn in its place.
data.flavor: This corpse brings its own flowers to the funeral.

data.name: Illthorn
data.flavor: "Look, Barbra. Wires!" \n- Ihrbraman, Creature Collector

passiverules.name: Spiky 1
passiverules.description: When Illthorn is attacked in melee, Illthorn deals 1 damage to attacking unit.

data.name: Decimation
data.description: All units on target row lose 1 Health. Opponent's idol on that row loses 2 Health.
data.flavor: One by one by one they fall, and now we've reached the Cobalt Hall...

data.name: God Hand
data.description: All your units gain +2 Attack until end of turn, and have their Countdown decreased by 2.
data.flavor: Howl for the gods!

data.name: Hellspitter Mortar
data.description: Attacks a randomly selected tile on opponent's board.
data.flavor: Aim? With enough power you don't need aim.

passiverules.name: Ranged attack
passiverules.description: This unit does not take damage from attacking Spiky units.

data.name: Knight Scholar
data.description: When Knight Scholar's Countdown is 0, you may increase its Countdown by 2 to draw 1 scroll.
data.flavor: Knowledge is strength.

data.name: Obelisk
data.flavor: Good for leaning on. And hiding behind...

data.name: Ducal Infantryman
data.description: All other creatures you control on the same row as Ducal Infantryman gain +1 Attack.
data.flavor: Strength in numbers.

data.name: Ducal Skirmisher
data.flavor: Slice and dice!

passiverules.name: Relentless
passiverules.description: If opponent blocking unit is destroyed, this creature will continue its attack.

data.name: Ducal Spearman
data.flavor: If you bait them, they will come.

passiverules.name: Spiky 2
passiverules.description: When Ducal Spearman is damaged in combat, Ducal Spearman deals 2 damage to attacking unit.

data.name: Resonant Helm
data.description: Enchanted unit's Health is healed by 1 every time you play a Spell or Enchantment.
data.flavor: You'll hear the silent whispers of magic and it will change you.

data.name: Crossbowman
data.flavor: Locked, loaded, and lying in wait...

passiverules.name: Ranged attack
passiverules.description: This unit does not take damage from attacking Spiky units.

data.name: Royal Infantryman
data.description: All other creatures you control on the same row as Royal Infantryman gain +1 Health.
data.flavor: Yes, my Liege. I'll protect them, my Liege.

data.name: Royal Skirmisher
data.flavor: Double the swords, double the fun!

passiverules.name: Relentless
passiverules.description: If opponent blocking unit is destroyed, this creature will continue its attack.

data.name: Royal Spearman
data.flavor: HOOOOOLLLD!

passiverules.name: Spiky 2
passiverules.description: When Royal Spearman is damaged in combat, Royal Spearman deals 2 damage to attacking unit.

data.name: Bunny
data.description: If Bunny's Attack is 0, it will summon another Bunny in an adjacent tile instead of attacking.
data.flavor: Cute, crafty, and quick to procreate.

data.name: Gravelock Outcast
data.description: Pay one Growth to heal Gravelock Outcast to full health.
data.flavor: "Cast out from gravelock society? Wow, that's some feat."\n- Siani, Dyrran Historian

abilities.name: Regenerate
abilities.description: Heal self to full health for one Growth

data.name: Tethered Recruit
data.description: When Tethered Recruit is destroyed, increase Order by 1.
data.flavor: "Its mind is muddled, but its heart is still with the army."\n- Arhart, Mire Master

data.name: Darkstrike
data.description: Deal 2 damage to target unit. If that unit is destroyed, increase Decay by 1.
data.flavor: When darkness envelops, life abandons.

data.name: Efficiency
data.description: Target unit gains +1 Attack until end of turn. If that unit kills another unit this turn, increase Energy by 1.
data.flavor: The best discipline conserves energy.

data.name: Erode
data.description: Target structure on your side is dealt 2 damage. Increase Decay by 1.
data.flavor: From life, destruction. From ashes, life.

data.name: Return To Nature
data.description: Opponent creatures get -1 Health until end of turn. If a creature with this effect is killed, increase Growth by 1.
data.flavor: Wither and begin anew.

data.name: Blast Strike
data.description: Every time enchanted creature deals combat damage to a unit Blast Strike deals 1 damage to every unit adjacent to that unit.
data.flavor: "Needs more brutal."\n- Arran, Machine Priest

data.name: Rigged
data.description: When enchanted structure is destroyed in melee combat, its attacker takes 4 damage.
data.flavor: Strap it on, then stand back.

data.name: Overdrive
data.description: When Overdrive comes into play, and at the beginning of its following turns, enchanted structure's Countdown is decreased by 2. At the end of these turns, it is dealt 2 damage.
data.flavor:
"I know it'll break. I just
don't care."
- Arran, Machine Priest

data.name: Plating
data.description: Enchanted unit disregards next attack or damage taken. Plating is removed afterwards.
data.flavor: Almost works like real armor.

data.name: Iron Whip
data.description: Target unit takes 1 damage. Its Attack is increased by 1 until end of turn and Countdown decreased by 1.
data.flavor: A whip for steel hides.

data.name: Incendiaries
data.description: Opponent's Structures take 3 damage.
data.flavor: It's raining cats and bombs.

data.name: Redesign
data.description: Target creature's Attack and Health switch values.
data.flavor: "Trust me, it's better this way."\n-Amhan, Machine Master

data.name: Desperation
data.description: Target creature gets +2 Attack until end of turn for each opponent unit on the same row. It is then dealt 1 damage.
data.flavor: Many a conqueror have been surprised by the ferocity of desperate defenders.

data.name: Blind Rage
data.description: Target creature deals damage equal to its Countdown to all adjacent units. Its Countdown is then increased by 1.
data.flavor: When you're seeing red, friends and foes look the same.

data.name: Machination Mindset
data.description: Enchanted melee creature becomes relentless. Its Attack is increased by 1.
data.flavor: No doubt, no fear, no thought.

data.name: Concentrate Fire
data.description: Target unit with Ranged or Lobber will make an extra attack after its next attack.
data.flavor: Double the fire, double the fun.

data.name: Tool Initiate
data.description: When Tool Initiate's Countdown is 0, you may increase its Countdown by 1 to increase target structure's Attack by 1.
data.flavor: "Let me just tweak this..."\n-Amhan, Machine Master

abilities.name: Increase Attack
abilities.description: When unit's Countdown is 0, you may increase the Countdown by 1 to increase target structure's Attack by 1.

data.name: Metal Heart
data.description: Target creature gains Attack equal to the number of structures you control until end of turn.
data.flavor: More machines, more mayhem.

data.name: Bombard
data.description: All units with Ranged or Lobber attack have their Countdown decreased by 2.
data.flavor: FIRE AT WILL!

data.name: Clock Library
data.description: When Clock Library's Countdown becomes 0, it's destroyed and you draw 3 scrolls.
data.flavor: Tick. Tick. Tick. Tick...

data.name: Wildling
data.description: When a creature is summoned adjacent to Wildling, Wildling is dealt 1 damage and its Attack is increased by 1.
data.flavor: Sometimes you just want to be left alone.

data.name: Mangonel
data.description: When Mangonel comes into play, your Mangonels' Countdowns are set to the lowest of any you control.
data.flavor: Powerful, portable, and packing a punch.

passiverules.name: Lobber
passiverules.description: This unit attacks at a specific section of the board.

data.name: Vaettr of the Wild
data.description: When Vaettr of the Wild comes into play, increase Growth by 1. When Vaettr of the Wild leaves play, decrease Growth by 1.
data.flavor: The forest personified. Cute.

data.name: Imperial Resources
data.description: Draw 2 scrolls. Your idols are healed by 1. All your units are healed by 1. Increase Order by 1.
data.flavor: From the furthest reaches of the Empire, they hauled their gear. Now, the time has come to use it.

data.name: Divine Mark
data.description: When enchanted creature is destroyed, it is returned to owners hand. If it was killed by damage from another unit, that unit is returned to its owner's hand.
data.flavor: "Let's try that again."\n- Lord Ungstram, Royal Strategist

data.name: Unbind
data.description: Sacrifice target non-Decay structure you control. Increase Decay by 1.
data.flavor: "Let's put that to better use."

data.name: Charge Coil
data.description: When Charge Coil attacks, a random opponent unit is dealt 1 damage.
data.flavor: "This is extremely annoying."\n- Arhart, Mire Master

data.name: Viscera Sage
data.description: When Viscera Sage kills another unit, draw 1 scroll.
data.flavor: Reading entrails takes a strong stomach.

data.name: Loyal Darkling
data.description: When Countdown is 0, Loyal Darkling can sacrifice itself. When Loyal Darkling is destroyed, it deals 2 damage to your opponent's idol on the same row.
data.flavor: To night, she'll return.

data.name: Husk
data.flavor: Hollow, haggard, happy to help.

data.name: Mire Shambler
data.description: Before attacking, Mire Shambler moves to a random adjacent tile.
data.flavor: "From the depths of the mire, the Masked appeared." \n- Excerpt, Ilmire Journal II

data.name: Mangy Rat
data.description: When Mangy Rat attacks a creature, that creature gets poisoned for 3 rounds.
data.flavor:
Tiny Merchants
Trader of Graves
Death's Servants
Fate's Knaves

data.name: Ilmire Witch Doctor
data.description: When a Human creature adjacent to Ilmire Witch Doctor is destroyed, a Husk is summoned in its place.
data.flavor: "I can't promise you eternal life, but I can keep you standing."

passiverules.name: Ranged attack
passiverules.description: This unit does not take damage from attacking Spiky units.

data.name: Blightbearer
data.description: Blightbearer takes 1 poison damage before attacking. When Blightbearer is destroyed, all creatures on the same row get poisoned for 3 rounds.
data.flavor: In this army, illness is no excuse.

data.name: Puppet Soldier
data.description: When Puppet Soldier is destroyed by damage, all units on the same row are destroyed.
data.flavor: The soldier is false. The fear is not.

data.name: Pillar of Disease
data.description: Opponent's units on the same row as Pillar of Disease have Attack decreased by 1.
data.flavor: The Ilmire provides for its own.

data.name: Animovore
data.description: Enchant a unit you control. When a unit adjacent to enchanted unit dies, enchanted unit is dealt 1 damage and you draw 1 scroll.
data.flavor: I'll take a piece of your mind, if you don't mind.

data.name: Harvester
data.description: Does not count down.  When a creature dies, Harvester's Countdown is decreased by 1.
data.flavor: We've learnt to live, and die, with the Harvesters.

passiverules.name: Relentless
passiverules.description: If opponent blocking unit is destroyed, this creature will continue its attack.

data.name: Totem of Suffering
data.description: When a creature you control dies, the opposing idol on that row is dealt 1 damage.
data.flavor: Empathy can be a cruel thing.

data.name: Soul Scrounger
data.description: When a creature is destroyed, enchanted unit's Countdown is decreased by 1.
data.flavor: Those who have fallen act through the living.

data.name: Grisly Graft
data.description: Enchant creature you control. When Grisly Graft comes into play, sacrifice adjacent creatures. Enchanted creature gains Attack and Health equal to the number of creatures sacrificed.
data.flavor: Great needlework!

data.name: Arthritis
data.description: Each time enchanted unit deals damage, Arthritis also deals 1 damage to that unit.
data.flavor: You're only as old as you feel.

data.name: Restless Bones
data.description: All your Undead units gain +2 Attack until end of turn, and Countdown decreased by 1.
data.flavor: "Angering the dead is no trivial task." \n- Grahm, Animator

data.name: Tempo Theft
data.description: Two target units switch Countdown values.
data.flavor: No refund upon completed transaction.

data.name: Shroud of Unlife
data.description: When enchanted creature is destroyed, a Husk is summoned in its place.
data.flavor: "You'll not find warmth in this garb." \n- Tobai, Bone Merchant

data.name: Damning Curse
data.description: Destroy target creature. Units you control are dealt 1 damage.
data.flavor: When someone else is paying, who cares about the price?

data.name: Languid
data.description: Enchanted unit's Attack is decreased by 2. When Languid comes into play, draw 1 scroll.
data.flavor: Play nice!

data.name: Energy Siphon
data.description: When Energy Siphon comes into play, increase Energy by 1. Enchanted creature's Attack and Health are decreased by 1.
data.flavor: Resources are everywhere. It's just a matter of extraction.

data.name: Brain Lice
data.description: When Brain Lice comes into play, enchanted creature becomes poisoned for 3 rounds. When enchanted creature is destroyed, draw 1 scroll.
data.flavor: Scratch all you want. The itch is in your head.

data.name: Searing Shackles
data.description: Enchanted unit deals 1 damage to its controller's idol on the same row at the end of it's controller's turn. Enchanted unit is dealt 2 damage when it moves.
data.flavor: Death is the only escape.

data.name: Miasma Well
data.description: All Poison damage is increased by 1.
data.flavor: DO NOT DRINK.

data.name: Pillar of Fatigue
data.description: When a creature moves, its Countdown is increased by 1.
data.flavor: What good are tactics when your men can't lift their swords?

data.name: Infectious Blight
data.description: Enchanted creature is dealt 1 poison damage at the beginning of each round. If enchanted unit is killed by poison damage, a random creature on the same side gets Infectious Blight.
data.flavor: The plague doesn't discriminate.

data.name: Necrogeddon
data.description: Destroy all creatures you control. Creatures destroyed this way are replaced by undead Husks at Countdown 0.
data.flavor: "This won't do. Lets start over."\n-Nuru, Flesh-seamstress

data.name: Beast Rat
data.flavor: "Oh look how big they are compared to those in the city!"\n- Ihrbraman, Creature Collector

data.name: Soul Steal
data.description: Destroy target creature with health 2 or less. Summon a Mire Shambler on a random tile on your side.
data.flavor: Ilmire mercy is worse than death.

data.name: Regeniture
data.description: Target unit gains 2 Health. When Regeniture comes into play, enchanted unit's controller's idol on that row is dealt 1 damage.
data.flavor: Sometimes you can squeeze blood from a stone.

data.name: Draining Mist
data.description: All opponent units with Countdown 1 or less have their Countdown increased by 2.
data.flavor: "Wait, I have an idea!"\n-Nuru, Flesh-seamstress

data.name: Roasted Bean Potion
data.description: Enchanted creature's Move is increased by 1. When Roasted Bean Potion comes into play, enchanted unit is healed by 2.
data.flavor: It's an acquired taste. By the barrel from far Dyrra.

data.name: Oblivion Seeker
data.description: When Oblivion Seeker is destroyed, draw 2 scrolls.
data.flavor: He leaves nothing but memories.

passiverules.name: Ranged attack
passiverules.description: This unit does not take damage from attacking Spiky units.

data.name: Ilmire Rot Eater
data.description: When a creature adjacent Ilmire Rot Eater dies, Ilmire Rot Eater gains 1 Attack and 1 Health.
data.flavor: Corpses are surprisingly nutritious.

data.name: Ilmire Hunter
data.flavor: Like the mire, Hunters kill without mercy.

passiverules.name: Slayer
passiverules.description: When Ilmire Hunter deals damage to a creature, that creature is destroyed.

data.name: Scavenger Construct
data.description: When an adjacent unit dies, Scavenger Construct's Health is increased by 2.
data.flavor: "Feed the Construct!"\n- Nuru, Flesh-seamstress

data.name: Atrophy
data.description: Target unit's Attack is decreased by 5 until end of opponent's next turn.
data.flavor: It usually takes longer.

data.name: Cluster Hex
data.description: All units on target tile and adjacent tiles gain Curse 1.
data.flavor: Curse upon you, and your children, and their children for seven generations.

data.name: Cursemonger
data.description: When Countdown is 0, Cursemonger may increase its Countdown by 2 to give target unit Curse 2.
data.flavor: "Needles and bones, my darling, that's my trade."

passiverules.name: Ranged attack
passiverules.description: This unit does not take damage from attacking Spiky units.

abilities.name: Curse
abilities.description: When unit's Countdown is 0, you may increase the Countdown by 2 to give target unit Curse 2.

data.name: Pestis
data.description: Enchanted creature gains +1 Attack for each Rat on that side. When enchanted creature kills another unit, summon a Mangy Rat on a random tile the same side.
data.flavor: There's no virtue among vermin.

data.name: Hex Marks
data.description: When enchanted creature deals combat damage to an idol, it deals 3 extra damage.
data.flavor: It's not just about looks.

data.name: Noaidi
data.description: When Noaidi comes into play, you gain 1 resource of each non-Growth type your opponent has.
data.flavor: For the Kinfolk, the moose migration marks the beginning of the new year.

data.name: Solemn Giant
data.description: Does not count down. Pay 2 Energy to decrease Countdown by 2. This ability can be used multiple times per turn.
data.flavor: "The Giants are no more, so we made new ones."\n-Amhan, Machine Master

abilities.name: Pay 2 Energy
abilities.description: Pay 2 Energy to decrease Countdown by 2.

data.name: Dust Runner
data.description: When Dust Runner deals damage to a creature with 3 or less Health, that creature is destroyed.
data.flavor: "Kinfolk make for great\ntarget practice."\n- Sarh, Dust Runner

passiverules.name: Ranged attack
passiverules.description: This unit does not take damage from attacking Spiky units.

data.name: Wings Shield
data.description: Wings Shield has Armor X, where X is the number of units behind it (combat damage dealt to Wings Shield is decreased by X).
data.flavor: "I shield those I love. From them I draw strength."

data.name: Automata Forge
data.description: Instead of attacking, Automata Forge summons a Gun Automaton on an adjacent tile. Pay 3 Energy to decrease Countdown by 1. This ability can be used multiple times per turn.

abilities.name: Pay 3 Energy
abilities.description: Pay 3 Energy to decrease Countdown by 1.

data.name: Stag Heart
data.description: Enchanted unit gets +1 Attack and +1 Health for each Stag Heart on the same side.
data.flavor: The Kinfolk judge every beast on their own merits.

data.name: Faith Duty
data.description: Enchant unit you control. At the end of each of its turns, enchanted unit is dealt 1 damage and opponent units on that row get their Countdown increased by 1.
data.flavor: Willingly, but not wisely.

data.name: Metal Wonder
data.description: When your opponent plays a Spell or Enchantment, Metal Wonder deals 2 damage to a random idol under their control.
data.flavor: Machine victory, no fiddly bits.

data.name: Crone
data.description: Crone does not attack.  When Crone is destroyed in melee combat, the attacking unit is destroyed.
data.flavor: "Grandma in the front. The hag's time is up."\n- Halm, Berserker

data.name: Breaker
data.description: When Breaker deals damage, its Attack is increased by 1.
data.flavor: Where Breakers go,\nonly twigs remain.

data.name: Oak Blood
data.description: Enchanted creature gains +6 Health.
data.flavor: Trading with Vilewood trees is never a bargain.

data.name: Fierce Tactics
data.description: All your melee creatures become Relentless until end of turn.
data.flavor: "They have the weapons, but we have the will!"\n- Halm, Berserker

data.name: Rat King
data.description: Summons a Beast Rat on target tile and on two adjacent random tiles.
data.flavor: Obey the Jarl, but fear the King.

data.name: Appurtenance
data.description: Enchanted unit gets +1 Health for each Beast you control.
data.flavor: They have their leaders, nature has hers.

data.name: Berserker
data.description: When Berserker takes damage, Berserker's Attack is increased by 1. At the beginning of your turn, Berserker heals 1 point of Health.
data.flavor: "No. We only fight for Kav." - Halm, Berserker.

data.name: Sister of the Bear
data.flavor: "Honored Sisters. Your strength will be my hammer against the hated Empire!"\n- Jarl Urhald

data.name: Kinfolk Ranger
data.flavor: Many of the ghost stories told about the deeper woods can probably be attributed to the stealthy rangers.

data.name: Owl
data.flavor: Hoot. Hoot?

data.name: Sister of the Owl
data.description: Two Owls are summoned together with Sister of the Owl. Whenever an Owl does damage, Sister of the Owl's Attack increases by 1. Whenever an Owl is destroyed, Sister of the Owl's Health increases by 1.
data.flavor: Knowing and nocturnal.

data.name: Storm Runner
data.flavor: Storm Runners have perfected the art of... throwing.

passiverules.name: Lobber
passiverules.description: This unit attacks at a specific section of the board.

data.name: State Machine
data.description: When a creature comes into play on opponent's side, State Machine deals 1 damage to that creature. When State Machine's Countdown becomes 0, it's destroyed.
data.flavor: Originally intended to roast beans.

data.name: Supercharged
data.description: At the beginning of each of enchanted unit's owner's turns, enchanted unit makes a ranged attack dealing 1 damage.
data.flavor: It's not like they know how it works, exactly... but it's certainly useful.

data.name: Machine Chant
data.description: Deal damage to target unit equal to the number of structures you control. Increase Energy by 1.
data.flavor: "It's an odd song for sure. Just wait for the crescendo!" \n- Arran, Machine Priest

data.name: Scout Automaton
data.description: All other Automatons you control get +1 Attack.
data.flavor: No machine is complete without its smallest gears.

passiverules.name: Armor 1
passiverules.description: All combat damage dealt to Scout Automaton is reduced by 1.

passiverules.name: Ranged attack
passiverules.description: This unit does not take damage from attacking Spiky units.

data.name: Magnetizer
data.description: Any unit hit by Magnetizer gets its Countdown increased by 1.
data.flavor: Power is relative. A sleeping enemy is a harmless enemy.

passiverules.name: Ranged attack
passiverules.description: This unit does not take damage from attacking Spiky units.

data.name: Mystic Altar
data.description: When Countdown is 0, you may increase Countdown of target creature you control by 2. Draw a scroll.
data.flavor: Learning takes time.

abilities.name: Mystic Altar
abilities.description: Target unit you control has its countdown increased by 2. Draw a scroll.

data.name: Redeploy
data.description: Swap two target rows on your side.
data.flavor: "Wings to the east, vanguard south. Go!"

data.name: Caller's Bane
data.description: When enchanted unit deals combat damage to an idol, other idols on the same side are dealt 1 damage.
data.flavor: Each idol is strongly linked to its Caller.

data.name: Aging Knight
data.description: Each time Aging Knight attacks, its base Countdown is increased by 1.
data.flavor: The last thing a warrior learns is patience.

data.name: Royal Banner
data.description: All non-human units get Countdown increased by 2 after attacking.
data.flavor: Where the banner goes, the Empire soon follows.

data.name: Fleetness
data.description: Enchanted unit's base Countdown is reduced by 1.
data.flavor: Faster is better than Stronger.

data.name: Machinated
data.description: Enchanted creature gets Attack increased by 5 and base Countdown increased by 1.
data.flavor: Man shall become metal.

data.name: Corrode
data.description: Units you control deal double damage to idols until end of turn. If at least one idol is destroyed by a unit you control this turn,  draw 1 scroll.
data.flavor: Even the Machines know heresy.

data.name: Wings Soldier
data.flavor: The elites of the Empire strike with precision.

data.name: Vigor Extraction
data.description: Target unit's Countdown is increased by 2. If Countdown is then 4 or more, increase Decay by 1.
data.flavor: The life of another, put to better use.

data.name: Wicked Being
data.description: When enchanted unit is attacked in melee, attacker gets Curse 2.
data.flavor: There are no innocents in the Mire.

data.name: Refined Strategy
data.description: Move target structure you control to an unoccupied tile on that side. Its countdown is decreased by 1.
data.flavor: "Perhaps we should move the catapults to the ridge?"

data.name: Siege Cracker
data.description: When Siege Cracker deals damage to an idol, that idol is dealt an additional 5 damage.
data.flavor: What do you mean, "bombs for hands"?

data.name: Ripper
data.flavor: "I was taught to be ready!"

data.name: Unforseen Onslaught
data.description: All your creatures with attack 1 or less get Slayer until end of turn.
data.flavor: 'Tis just a scratch.

data.name: Ilmire Tribesman
data.flavor: Fighting for their kin, alive or dead.

data.name: Pest Dissimulator
data.description: When Pest Dissimulator deals damage to a creature, the damaged creature and adjacent creatures are poisoned for 3 rounds.
data.flavor: Don't try and find me.

passiverules.name: Ranged attack
passiverules.description: This unit does not take damage from attacking Spiky units.

data.name: Monstrous Brood
data.description: Creatures you control with the same name as target creature are destroyed and replaced by a Monstrosity.
data.flavor: A second birth. A new life. More teeth.

data.name: Monstrosity
data.description: While another Monstrosity is adjacent, Attack and Health are increased by 1. While any other creature is adjacent, Attack and Health are decreased by 1.
data.flavor: Twisted. Transformed. Terrifying.

data.name: Fungify
data.description: Enchanted creature gets Health increased by 5 and base Countdown increased by 1.
data.flavor: "Nightmarish stuff,\nbut damn, it works." \n- Isurd, Scryer

data.name: Ire And Bile
data.description: All units gain Curse 1 and +1 Attack until end opponent's turn.
data.flavor: A conflict is easier to start than it is to end.

data.name: Sickening Fumes
data.description: Until end of opponent's turn, opponent units have their attack decreased by 3.
data.flavor: It's not weather. It's miasma density.

data.name: Uneasy Alliance
data.description: Enchanted creature's Attack is increased by 2 for each Uneasy Alliance on the same side. When enchanted unit is destroyed, all units on that side enchanted with Uneasy Alliance are destroyed.
data.flavor: This won't end well.

data.name: Bloodline Taint
data.description: Target unit, and other units on the same side that share a subtype, gain Curse 2.
data.flavor: A cruel legacy.

data.name: Watcher
data.description: When a unit adjacent to Watcher is destroyed by non-combat damage or death effects, Watcher deals 3 damage to a random opponent idol.
data.flavor: The Harvester's wrath lingers even after death.

data.name: Wings Captain
data.description: When Wings Captain's Countdown becomes 0, all adjacent Soldiers have their Countdown decreased by 1 and their Move increased by 1 until end of turn.
data.flavor: "Flanking maneuver!"\n- Ays, Wings Captain

data.name: Eager Scryer
data.description: If Eager Scryer's Countdown is 2 or more at the end of your turn, draw a scroll.
data.flavor: "I deal in confusion. I buy it from you, and sell it to your enemy."\n- Isurd, Scryer

data.name: Cannonetta
data.flavor: "T- the bullet went through clean. I'll be fine."\n- Aru, now diseased

passiverules.name: Piercing
passiverules.description: When Cannonetta deals damage, half of that damage (rounded down) is dealt to the next target on that row.

passiverules.name: Ranged attack
passiverules.description: This unit does not take damage from attacking Spiky units.

data.name: Untainted
data.description: Enchanted unit cannot be targeted by Spells or abilities.
data.flavor: Those who do not want can not be corrupted.

data.name: Machine Divinator
data.description: Machine Divinator does not attack. While Machine Divinator is in play, your structures' Health is increased by 1. When Machine Divinator's Countdown becomes 0, a random structure you control with Countdown 1 or more has its Countdown decreased by 1.

data.name: Beetle Stone
data.description: When another Beetle Stone comes into play, two damage is dealt to a random opponent idol. Beetle Stone is then placed at the top of your library.
data.flavor: The beetles were extremely popular once.
